divs: Sighting DetailsI take my dog out about 10PM every nigh. A month ago I took her out and was looking up and saw a star-like object and it was moving. I thought it was a satellite but it was moving faster. When it made a perfect 90 degree turn it was obvious it was military or something else. The turn radius was not a "standard rate turn" as defined by the FAA. I watched it go out of site. Then another came and did the same maneuver. Those sightings were not reported to MUFON. I wasn't sure if they were military or not. Last night at I took my dog out early. When I cam back in and laid down I saw an object out my window. At first I thought of Jupiter. But it was to far north. Jupiter comes up in the SE. It also was not a bright as Jupiter. The object was 30 degrees off the horizon and N 60 degrees. As it was sitting still I guessed it's distance in relation to the mountains to be about 30 miles. I got my binoculars and then it started to move north and dim. I tracked it for about 15 seconds as it dimmed and went out of site. There were no aircraft lighting. This was not a conventional airplane. They don't sit still! It was not a helicopter. Helicopters do not accelerate that quickly. This object was like the sighting in Norway which has the movie attached. Reported from N38.58.169 W106.13.166
Summary: Very bright then dimmed when it began to move.
